title: Miner connectivity
subtitle: End to end connectivity check, validating the miner ability to receive storage deals, and CIDgravity connectivity.

ERR_NO_PEER_ID_SET_ON_CHAIN.name: No Peer ID set on chain
ERR_NO_PEER_ID_SET_ON_CHAIN.resolveTips:
Set the Peer ID on chain using the following commands (given that boost init generates a new identity) :
Get the miner Peer ID : "boostd net id"
2. Set the Peer ID on chain : "lotus-miner actor set-peer-id "

ERR_NO_MULTI_ADDRESS_SET_ON_CHAIN.name: No Multiaddr set on chain
ERR_NO_MULTI_ADDRESS_SET_ON_CHAIN.resolveTips:
Set the Multiaddr on chain using the following commands :
1. Get the value of LibP2P ListenAddresses from boostd config.toml
2. Set the Multiaddr on chain : "lotus-miner actor set-addrs "

ERR_INVALID_MULTI_ADDRESS_IN_MINER_INFO.resolveTips:
Set the correct Multiaddr on chain using the following commands :
1. Get the value of LibP2P ListenAddresses from boostd config.toml
2. Set the new Multiaddr on chain : "lotus-miner actor set-addrs "
ERR_INVALID_MULTI_ADDRESS_IN_MINER_INFO.name: Invalid Multiaddr

ERR_CONNECT_MINER_PEER_ID.name: Cannot connect the miner Peer ID
